Package cps.mouradalpha

Class CVMBasic

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
      • cps.mouradalpha.CVMBasic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.ComponentVirtualMachineI
    public class CVMBasic
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
    The class CVMBasic implements the single JVM assembly for our project We have a Publisher, a Subscriber and a Broker in the middle providing its services for them.
    Author:
    Alpha Issiaga DIALLO / Alpha Issiaga DIALLO
